Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
** Syncshell Admin Panel restructuring

 * Moved Area Binding Settings into Own Tab.
 * Redesigned The Area Binding Settings Page.
 * Added an hint for Area Bound Syncshells in Invites Tab of the Syncshell Admin Panel.
 **Changes & Enhancements:**

 * Owners of a Syncshell will now have a **Delete Syncshell** Button instead of **Leave Syncshell** in context Menu.
 * Added Some more Checks for Property Ownership.
 * Added check to prevent double location binding.
